duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare wafers for experimentation and perform thin film processes under limited supervision.
Operate scanning electron microscope for analysis and imaging, as well as evaluation of wafers and thin films.
Record process conditions and observations, evaluate experimental results, and prepare graphs and tables summarizing the findings.
Coordinate instrument repair, maintenance, and equipment orders. Set up equipment for experiments.
Interface with requestors, monitor wafer in process, and maintain throughput. Provide solutions to atypical problems based on existing precedents or procedures.
